scripts.build:all: npm run build:main && npm run build:portal && npm run build:admin
scripts.build:main: cd main && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && mkdir dist-combined\main && xcopy /E /I /Y main\dist\* dist-combined\main\
scripts.build:portal: cd portal && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && mkdir dist-combined\portal && xcopy /E /I /Y portal\dist\* dist-combined\portal\
scripts.build:admin: cd admindashboard && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && mkdir dist-combined\admindashboard && xcopy /E /I /Y admindashboard\dist\* dist-combined\admindashboard\
